channel.title: Server crahser
channel.description: Said his name was "nathan" cpc2-ches1-0-0-cust516.lutn.cable.ntl.com He was logging on with that, with diffrent ports like cpc2-ches1-0-0-cust516.lutn.cable.ntl.com:43954 And he created over 150 nulls, crashed my server. He logged on as Mod Fab. How can i stop things like this happening agian?

item.title: Server crahser
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Maybe l2Program?

There are super easy ways to stop nulls/crashers.

Can your computer even handle 200 People?

Read full topic

item.title: Server crahser
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

Necessary?

[quote=“Pureman0194, post:11, topic:171821”]Lol There Laggy But It Also Depends On These 4 Things

1 - RAM
2 - Players On Server
3 - PC Speed
4 - Internet Speed[/quote]
Well my computer is pretty good. Not top of the line, but it usually holds around 90 people without lag, but there were 10 on when he decided to crash.
I used fruugoscapes tut on how to make hacker proof now.

Read full topic

item.title: Server crahser
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:4, topic:171821”][quote author=surfer25 link=topic=231904.msg1984651#msg1984651 date=1199765898]
I think i read it wrong.
He created nulls?
[/quote]

Ah, you must be new
Nulls are screw ups in packets.
Its what a crasher uses to kill servers.[/quote]
Yea, So is there anyway i can get rid of this vulrenabiltiy in my server? also, he said that he owns bashscape pk’s and i leeched from him, even though bashscape pks is super leeched from sleepydev, and based out of varrock, while i created mine from jorscape. He also said i sell admin and mods, wich i dont. Is he able to report me for sellin mod and admin without proof?

Read full topic

Come to think of it, mayby he was using a little server checker program and clicking it repeadily? is that possible?
